reviewText: This is a complete waste of time. I bought it thinking that from the title "boost" it may have something to do with jumping. I got helpful advice like "don't forget to keep your feet in the footstraps"! This really doesn't help at all unless you're a complete beginner, never seen a kite before, etc. IT HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH JUMPING, BOOSTING, ETC!

DONT BUY THIS IS DVD..... THE WORST INSTRUCTIONAL KITTING DVD I'VE SEEN,,, JUST A COUPLE OF GUYS KITTING... VERY SHORT AND DIDNT LEARN NOTHING FROM IT.... ANY OTHER KITTING DVD IS BETTER THAN THIS ONE...

For anyone getting into the sport of kiteboarding, or if you want to push it to the next level then don't miss this DVD- well produced, lots of angles, good instruction, and action inbetween to keep it interesting.
